title: SEC Charges FTX Auditor for Helping Clients Violate Securities Laws
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced charges against an accounting firm that worked for failed cryptocurrency exchange FTX. The company, Prager Metis, has been accused of facilitating clients in breaking federal securities laws and also auditor independence violations. FTX Accountant Prager Metis Charged With Auditor Rules Violations The U.S. securities regulator has charged […]

title: Stalling or steady? The debate over U.S. job market
description: Stalling or steady? That’s the question on the lips of everyone following the U.S. job market right now. With the anticipated slowdown in U.S. hiring for September, critics and supporters are rallying to defend their perspectives, each armed with a different set of numbers and forecasts. title: AI Recreations of Robin Williams are Disconcerting, Says Daughter Zelda
description: In the heart of the ongoing actors’ strike, the daughter of the iconic Robin Williams, Zelda Williams, has emerged as a vocal critic of the practice of AI recreations. In a poignant Instagram Story post, she expressed her deep concern over the use of artificial intelligence to recreate her father’s image and voice, highlighting the ... Read more
